Posts.Content: Hi Tinker I’m half way through 3 x FEC then 3 x Docetaxel so not quite the same but sounds similar. Having had 3 FEC now I’m very nervous about the change of drug next time round and remember being scared of the first treatment. Totally understandable there are so many unknowns.  Overall I’ve found it not as bad as I’d imagined. I took anything they offered and after bad vomiting on first round have an additional anti sickness which helped a lot. I also have sleeping tablets to counteract the steroids which were robbing me of sleep.  I am doing the cold cap and I have kept quite a bit of hair. Worth a try. It’s uncomfortable that’s for sure but I’m going with it for now.  Best of luck Xxxx
Posts.Title: Chemo Jitters
